org.hs.generator
Class GSourceFile

java.lang.Object
  |

All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, org.hs.util.Copy, at.dms.compiler.PhylumListener, Serializable
public class GSourceFile
extends GConstruct
implements Serializable

A source file, as expected by a standard Java compiler.

See Also:

Method Detail

setWorkingDir

public static void setWorkingDir(String workingDir)
Set the compiler's working directory. The KJC compiler runs on the command line, and responds to its working directory as expected.

setClasspath

public static void setClasspath(String classpath)
The classpath available to the compiler. Defaults to java.class.path when using KJC -- this is currently not working properly, and so I've rigged a call to the command line to compile the KJC generated .java file externally. In this latter context, the classpath does not default to java.class.path.

setExtensionDirs

public static void setExtensionDirs(String extDirs)
Set the extension directories. Defaults to java.ext.dirs.

setCompileCommand

public static void setCompileCommand(String compileCommand)
GSourceFile currently does not use the KJC compiler, but instead will generate a .java file corresponding to the contents of this GSourceFile, and make a call to System.exec with compileCommand to compile that file.

Parameters:
compileCommand - The absolute path to the command line compiler executable.

setCurrentDir

public static void setCurrentDir(org.hs.util.file.SuperFile currentDir)
Set the root directory from which the package name of this GSourceFile is resolved in the filesystem; provides a default value for the instance field directory, and may be overridden on an instance basis.

setLog

public static void setLog(GSourceFile.Log newLog)
Set a custom log file; must implement the interface GSourceFile.Log.

compile

public String compile()
               throws IOException,
                      at.dms.compiler.PositionedError,
                      at.dms.classfile.ClassFileFormatException
Compile this GSourceFile to the .class filename specified by directory and packageName and classname. Currently only uses KJC to print a .java file corresponding to the contents of this GConstruct, and compiles the file using s_compileCommand via System.exec.

IOException
at.dms.compiler.PositionedError
at.dms.classfile.ClassFileFormatException
